Summary: Saw an object with rows of red lights and a row of white lights in a "V" shape on belly
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my back porch late Monday evening, and early into Tuesday, when I noticed something moving across the sky that appeared unusual. I noticed planes and are easily identified, but this one stuck out. The colors were spectacular, so I continued to watch it. There was a row or strobing red lights that were very definitively ball shaped on both sides. The belly had a row of white lights that was in the shape of a "V" pattern. The exact shape was hard to describe, because the the strobe was very distracting. When I first noticed it, I thought that it might be a satellite, then it stopped moving, went backwards, then continued at an incredible rate of speed. It did this several times. It startled me, and it did not know how to react. I was a little scared to be honest. I have never seen anything like this. I had stood up to go back into the house when I noticed it had stopped again. Then it took off faster than anything I have ever seen, and disappeared out of sight behind trees.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Allen
There were no other sightings in Allen on or around July 29th 2008
